dayBreakerQuestions.name: dayCard1
dayBreakerQuestions.question: What would you like to change about school?

dayBreakerQuestions.name: dayCard2
dayBreakerQuestions.question: What would you like to change about your home?

dayBreakerQuestions.name: dayCard3
dayBreakerQuestions.question: If you had to choose between, super speed or super stretch, for your superhero power, what would you choose?

dayBreakerQuestions.name: dayCard4
dayBreakerQuestions.question: Complete this statement: My favorite character is... I am just like this character because...

dayBreakerQuestions.name: dayCard5
dayBreakerQuestions.question: If you could go on an adventure, where would you go?

dayBreakerQuestions.name: dayCard6
dayBreakerQuestions.question: If your favorite animal was as tall as a building, what would it do?

dayBreakerQuestions.name: dayCard7
dayBreakerQuestions.question: If you were as tall as a building, what would you do?

dayBreakerQuestions.name: dayCard8
dayBreakerQuestions.question: If you could make anything in the world, always be your favorite color, what would you pick?

dayBreakerQuestions.name: dayCard10
dayBreakerQuestions.question: Think of a song that your parent likes, what is it? And why do you think they like it?

nightQuestions.name: nightCard1
nightQuestions.question: If you could dream about anything, what would you choose?

nightQuestions.name: nightCard2
nightQuestions.question: You get to pick one movie and one snack for movie night, what would you pick?

nightQuestions.name: nightCard3
nightQuestions.question: You have a dream that you're in charge, what is the one rule you'd make?

nightQuestions.name: nightCard4
nightQuestions.question: Complete this statement: My favorite character is... And this character dreams about...

nightQuestions.name: nightCard5
nightQuestions.question: In your dream you're about to go on an adventure, are you traveling by sports car, jet, train, or hoverbike?

nightQuestions.name: nightCard6
nightQuestions.question: If you could have a slumber party what is the one song you'd want to hear? What is the one food you'd want to eat? And what game would you want to play?

nightQuestions.name: nightCard7
nightQuestions.question: You get to redecorate your room, what color would you paint it? What items would you add?

nightQuestions.name: nightCard8
nightQuestions.question: You get to pick a bedtime for everyone in your house, what time would it be?

nightQuestions.name: nightCard9
nightQuestions.question: In your dream, you have the power to talk to one kind of animal, what animal would it be?

nightQuestions.name: nightCard10
nightQuestions.question: Complete this statement: My name is...My band's name is... And we...
